RethinkDNS About Settings Internet Manager Part of Mozilla Builders MVP Program
Tip : Firewall prevents apps from accessing the Internet over Wifi or Mobile data. Since most forms of surveillance require the data to be sent over to a central repository, firewalling them effectively mitigates the threat. \n\nThere\'s a class of apps that require Internet connection all day, and those are usually communication apps like Gmail and messenger apps like WhatsApp. Firewalling them might not be an option, and that\'s why we built content blockers.
Auto Remove and Auto Grant Auto Revoke Do Nothing
Home
Ready to set dns based content blocker.
Content blocker no longer in effect.
RethinkDNS uses accessibility service to detect and firewall background applications. RethinkDNS does not collect or sell any information.
RethinkDNS

Welcome RethinkDNS is the easiest way to monitor app activity, circumvent Internet censorship, and firewall apps on your Android device.
Welcome Say hello to a safer, transparent, and secure Android.

Warning: RethinkDNS has been deactivated
Tap to change protection setting
Warning
Shown when RethinkDNS has encountered a problem.
Protected! Connected to Fast and Secure DNS.
Protected! Connected to Fast and Secure DNS.
Protected! Connected to Firewall.
Protected! Connected to DNS + Firewall.
waiting
failing
Your device is offline. Intra is waiting for a network connection.
RethinkDNS has detected another VPN on your device. If you enable Rethink, that VPN will be disabled. RethinkDNS is not as secure as a trusted VPN.
Warning: Queries are failing. You may want to choose a different server or restart Intra.
starting
Hang tight. Intra is establishing a server connection.
protected
Your connection is protected from DNS attacks.
Your connection is currently protected by Android Private DNS, but an attacker could disable or undermine this protection.
private dns is enabled
RethinkDNS has detected that the Android Private DNS setting is enabled. This means your DNS queries are already protected, so there\'s no need to enable Rethink.
not protected
Your connection is exposed to DNS attacks.
Connected to RethinkDNS Connected to Firewall
Connected to RethinkDNS and Firewall
Disconnected from RethinkDNS and Firewall
Block apps or a category of apps from connecting to the Internet in response to device events: Limiting access to the Internet helps prevent unwarranted data usage as well as conserves battery.
Check which apps consume your data. Streamline your Android smartphone or tablet. Quickly and easily uninstall multiple unwanted applications.
View DNS queries this device has requested. Typically, one request is sent for each Internet connection established by any app: For example, loading a web page can result in tens of DNS queries.
Keep tabs on incoming and outgoing Internet traffic. RethinkDNS firewall when enabled keeps track of connections an app makes to various endpoints on the Internet.
Block apps from connecting to the Internet. Limiting access to the Internet helps prevent unwarranted data usage, as well as conserve battery.
Apply firewall rules on all applications based on device events, for example, firewall when the device is locked or when a particular app is not in use.
Whitelisted applications are exempt from all firewall rules.
All connections to these IPs are blocked for all apps except the ones in the whitelist.

\u0009 Circumvent Internet censorship.\n\u0009 Prevent DNS manipulation attacks with encrypted DNS.\n\u0009 First line of defence against malware and other security threats.\n\u0009 Monitor DNS traffic.
Firewall
\u0009 Firewall select apps from connecting to the Internet.\n\u0009 Monitor network activity of all apps.\n\u0009 Note: This feature may consume extra battery.
DNS + Firewall
Permission - Accessibility
Action Required
RethinkDNS uses accessibility service to track which apps are in-use (foreground) versus those that are not in-use (background).
RethinkDNS accessibility service has stopped or crashed. Goto Settings and Force Stop RethinkDNS and start it again to use "Block any app not in use" feature.\n\n RethinkDNS uses accessibility service to track which apps are in-use (foreground) versus those that are not in-use (background).
Start Firewall / DNS+Firewall to configure apps.
Start DNS / DNS+Firewall to view logs
Firewall is disabled.
DNS is disabled.
Start Firewall / DNS+Firewall to view network logs.
https://www.bravedns.com/faq
No Filter Family Security RethinkDNS Basic Custom RethinkDNS Plus
Does not block any DNS requests. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.1 DNS endpoint. Blocks malware and adult content. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.3 DNS endpoint. Blocks malicious content. Uses Cloudflare\'s 1.1.1.2 DNS endpoint. Blocks malware and more. Uses RethinkDNS\'s non-configurable basic endpoint. Set your own custom DNS-over-HTTPS endpoint. Configurable DNS endpoint: Provides in-depth analytics of your Internet traffic, allows you to set custom rules and more.
Host connection failed. Try again. Invalid URL New custom DNS endpoint added.
RethinkDNS is the easiest way to monitor app activity, circumvent Internet censorship, and firewall apps on your Android device. RethinkDNS is a free and open-source project, led by ex-engineers from Amazon, IBM, and Scientific Games. to report bugs and suggest features. Join the RethinkDNS group on Telegram Links Visit rethinkdns.com Contribute on GitHub View FAQs Read our blog Contact App Email us What\'s new Follow us on Twitter RethinkDNS is part of Mozilla Builders MVP program. Check for app updates Let\'s Go mailto:hello@celzero.com [RethinkDNS]: http://www.telegram.me/rethinkdns https://blog.rethinkdns.com/ https://www.bravedns.com/faq https://github.com/celzero/rethink-app https://twitter.com/rethinkdns https://www.bravedns.com/ https://builders.mozilla.community/alumni.html v%1$s Suggest features
Delete all network logs? This only deletes network logs but not firewall rules. This operation is not reversible. Do you want to proceed?
Delete all DNS logs? This deletes on-device DNS logs. This operation is not reversible. Do you want to proceed?
Blocked connections All connections
Blocked connections All connections
Kill app App Info Clear all rules Block <u>all apps</u> from connecting to <u>this IP</u> Block <u>this app</u> from connecting to this IP Block <u>this app</u> from connecting to the Internet blocked %1$s %2$s allowed on <u>%1$s:%2$s</u> %3$s.\u0020 blocked on <u>%1$s/%2$s</u> %3$s
\u0009 <u>Rule #1</u>: Blocks an app from connecting to the Internet. \n \u0009 <u>Rule #2</u>: Blocks any app from connecting to a particular IP. \n \u0009 <u>Rule #3</u>: Blocks all connections when device locked (Universal Firewall). \n \u0009 <u>Rule #4</u>: Blocks any app not in use (Universal Firewall). \n \u0009 <u>Rule #5</u>: Blocks connections when source app unknown (Universal Firewall). \n \u0009 <u>Rule #6</u>: Blocks all UDP traffic except DNS (Universal Firewall).
Block connections when source app is unknown All rules related to this app will be cleared Clear rules All rules related to this app is cleared Whitelisted apps cannot be blocked. Excluded apps cannot be blocked.
Private DNS has been set. Disable Always-on VPN \"Always-On VPN\" is enabled on this device. To start RethinkDNS, please go to Settings app and disable \"Always-on VPN\". \"Always-on VPN\" enabled. Go to Settings app and disable \"Always-on VPN\" setting to stop RethinkDNS. Go to Settings Cancel
Some system apps are critical to proper functioning of a device. Block them only if you know what you are doing. Some system components are critical to proper functioning of a device. Block them only if you know what you are doing.
Universal All apps Network log
Configure Logs
Delete IP Rule? Deleting this rule would allow any app to connect to this IP. Do you want to proceed? No IPs found. Tap on entries in the Network Log screen to block individual IP addresses.
Delete all IP Rules? Deleting these rules would allow any application to connect to the currently blocked IPs.
Delete DoH endpoint? Delete the DNS over Https endpoint from saved configuration. Endpoint deleted.
Delete DNSCrypt resolver? Delete the DNSCrypt resolver from saved configuration. DNSCrypt resolver deleted.
Delete DNSCrypt Relay? Delete the DNSCrypt relay from saved configuration. DNSCrypt Relay deleted.
Delete DNS Proxy? Delete the DNS Proxy from saved configuration. DNS Proxy deleted.
Configure RethinkDNS Plus Configure RethinkDNS Plus to block adult content, dating and gambling websites, malware, spyware and more.
Download Blocklists Download blocklists (around 40MB) to use this feature?
Quit? Currently, %1$s blocklist(s) in-use. No additional blocklists have been set. Do you want to quit anyway? No change in the current configuration. Do you want to quit anyway?

Logging of network connections is disabled. To enable, goto Settings->General-> Turn on "Enable DNS and Firewall logs" Logging of DNS connections is disabled. To enable, goto Settings->General-> Turn on "Enable DNS and Firewall logs"

Blocks access to all adult, pornographic and explicit sites. It also blocks proxy and VPN domains that are used to bypass the filters. Mixed content sites (like Reddit) are also blocked. Google, Bing and Youtube are set to the Safe Mode.
Protects your device from malware and more.
Adguard DNS with safe-search and adult content blocking.
Block access to phishing, malware, and malicious domains. It does not block adult content.

What\'s new in v053a üéÅ ‚ùÑ Data Privacy Day (Jan 28) ‚ùÑÔ∏è üéÅ Incremental update:\n\n \u00091. Better support for the "Always-on VPN" feature.\n\n \u00092. Home screen UI refreshed.\n\n \u00093. Improvements in "Block apps not in use" behaviour.\n\n \u00094. Enable / disable auto-check for app updates.\n\n \u00095. Major performance and stability bug fixes.\n
Firewall Kill app when firewalled (experimental) Some stubborn apps persistently try to connect to the internet even when firewalled. Enable this setting to kill such apps.
DNS Enable on-device blocklists Choose from 170+ blocklists. configure Update last check for update: 10 mins ago
VPN Exclude apps from Firewall and DNS Connections from excluded apps will not monitored or blocked.
Allow Bypass Allow requesting apps to bypass RethinkDNS firewall on-demand. Some audio/video conference apps like Zoom and WhatsApp may require an on-demand bypass to function properly. "Disabled. Settings->VPN->Block connections without VPN" is enabled for RethinkDNS, enabling the feature will block the internet connection of the apps which are trying to bypass the VPN. Cannot exclude apps or allow bypass because VPN is running in lockdown mode.
Proxy (experimental) Setup SOCKS5 (TCP) Proxy Forward connections to SOCKS5 endpoint. Setup HTTP(S) Proxy This setting is only a recommendation and it is possible that apps will ignore it.
General Refresh Data Re-sync application list. Auto-start on power up (experimental) On Power up, Start RethinkDNS if it was running before device shut down.
